DOC.brief_summary: Study CR-AIR-006 part ATIR clinical development plan provide control data patient treat ATIR clinical study ( e.g . study CR-AIR-007 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Transplant-Related Mortality Patients Undergoing Peripheral Blood Stem Cell Transplantation Umbilical Cord Blood Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Any following hematologic malignancy : Acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) remission time transplantation Acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) remission time transplantation Myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) Patient receive following transplantation : Allogeneic Tcell deplete HSCT without ATIR administration haploidentical donor 1 January 2006 30 June 2013 ( HAPLO group ) Allogeneic HSCT fully match 1locus mismatch unrelated donor 1 January 2010 31 December 2012 ( MUD/MMUD group ) Double umbilical cord blood transplantation 1 January 2010 31 December 2012 2 human leukocyte antigen ( HLA ) mismatch HLAA , B , and/or DR unit recipient ( UCB group ) Male female , age ≥ 18 , ≤ 65 year . Allogeneic stem cell transplantation prior transplantation qualify study .
